actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB, Treasury Department, Health and Human Services Department.

official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to prohibit payment of benefits to inmates of facilities for the criminally insane.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance
subjects_top_term: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Amends title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act to prohibit the payment of title II benefits to inmates of facilities for the criminally insane. Provides that benefits which would be payable to an individual based on the wages and self-employment income of such an inmate shall be payable as though such inmate were receiving such benefits. Requires Federal and State agencies to make available to the Secretary, upon request, the names and social security numbers of inmates of facilities for the criminally insane which are under their jurisdiction.

titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to prohibit payment of benefits to inmates of facilities for the criminally insane.
